    What I’m Upto

Here’s what’s taking up most of my time at the moment:

  • Freelancing as a Digital Consultant.
  • Writing about Apps & Services that get things done.
  • Reading Company of One by Paul Jarvis.
  • Listening to Kid Sensation: Isolation by Kevin Hardman.
  • Reading Bachelor Pad Economics by Aaron Clarey.
  • Learning the Jekyll static site generator.
  • Watching The 100.

“Now” page inspired by Derek Sivers.
Last Updated: October 17th 2020.
